scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd src/backend; npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:containerize:dev: docker compose down && docker compose up --build --detach && sleep 5 && npm run docker:psql:init && npm run prisma:migrate:dev
scripts.docker:psql:init: docker exec postgres_container psql -U postgres -tc "SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname = 'goseekitapp'" | grep -q 1 && docker exec postgres_container psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE goseekitapp;" || docker exec postgres_container psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE goseekitapp;"
